publication.title: Analyzing Security Protocols in Hierarchical Networks
publication.jconf: Automated Technology for Verification and Analysis

publication.title: From generic to specific: off-line optimization for a general constraint solver
publication.abstract: A general constraint solver simplifies the implementation of program analyses because constraint generation can then be separated from constraint solving. In return, a general solver often needs to sacrifice performance for generality. We describe a strategy that given a set of constraints first performs off-line optimizations (performed before the execution of the solver) which enable a solver to find (potential)

publication.title: A Scalable Inclusion Constraint Solver Using Unification
